title: Pomodoro Penguin and the Library Lemur
description: Join Pomodoro Penguin and Violet Owl as they go on a special tour of the library with Maky, the Library Lemur. Learn alongside Pomodoro and Violet as Maky teaches them about the different types of books, the various sections of the library, and special library rules. This rhyming picture book is suitable for ages 4-8 as a tool to help teach children about the library. Pomodoro Penguin and the Library Lemur is the fifth book in the Adventures of Pomodoro Penguin children's educational picture book series.
author: Bryce Westervelt
